snippet: Detroit’s emergency manager, Kevyn Orr, has canceled a Wednesday bus tour of the city’s hardest-hit areas with about 25 creditors.
abstract: Kevyn Orr, Detroit's emergency manager, cancels bus tour of city's hardest-hit areas with about 25 creditors after several creditors opt out because of news media attention.
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s emergency manager, Kevyn Orr, has canceled a Wednesday bus tour of the city’s hardest-hit areas with about 25 creditors.

headline.main: Michigan: Creditors Opt Out of Tour
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Creditors Opt Out of Tour
